channel.title: Divinity-Clique ll Custom Zombie minigame ll Experiments ll Rocktail Fishing
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]This use to be Combat-x Untill i removed it, then put on the moparscape download page. I've partnered up with someone now and we have changed the name to Divinity-Clique, i've been working my ass off to improve loads on here from combat-x, such as drops, custom minigames to gain vesta, updating shops. Please don't hate just enjoy![/size][/center]
[center] [size=15pt]Forums - Under Construction! Website - Under construction![/size] [url=http://combatx.netai.net/Webclient.php][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5r0Dicj.gif[/img][size=15pt]Webclient[/size][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5r0Dicj.gif[/img][/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/69957337/client.jar][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5r0Dicj.gif[/img][size=15pt]Desktop Client[/size][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5r0Dicj.gif[/img][/url]
[center] - Nex, Corp, Jad, Nomad, bork, avatar and loads more! - Fullscreen With NO LAG - Bank Pins - Bank Searching - Squeal Of Fortune - Duel Arena - Fully equipped Voteshop - Decent and fun economy. - 24.7 Uptime - Vote4Cash / just a basic vote system - Trading - AutoCasting - 100% Private Messaging - 5 Levels of Donator status - Regular updates! - Completely Lag Free! - All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. - Working Teleblock - Yell with custom tags - Barrows - shops good pricings / still being updated
New updates from 14/7/13
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a69gOXD.png[/img] - Bork ::bork - Avatar of Destruction ::des - Updated Drops - Fixed weapon's hits - Combat styles
New updates from 07/8/13
- New spawn stop flooders - New world spawn - Custum starter - Vote shop Updated - donator ranks - donator titles - Expiriment - All caves updated - Rocktail Fishing - Construction 100%
New updates from 08/8/13 - World switching - World ports + ip
World 1 port 43594 - Eco
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bWZazi9.png[/img]
Custom Donator ranks
Devil Donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6PWSfIj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ACPbHNU.png[/img]
Soul Donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qcvXsAP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fnrPTfs.png[/img]
Super donator
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qJK8V73.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Hide n seek if you win you get a reward and get to pick what NPC and the Teleport name such as ::des was picked by "Beastlol" and it teleports you to his custom place to kill Avatar.
Bork was Decided by another player "andrew" In his custom place[/size]
[size=10pt]If you want something added we will tell you if we can do it or not and if we can it will be added straight away, On this server we listen to you! [/size]
Zombie Shop!
[IMG]http://i1193.photobucket.com/albums/aa350/brandon-rsps/zombie_zps462721e7.jpg[/img]
Zombie killing! [IMG]http://i1193.photobucket.com/albums/aa350/brandon-rsps/zombiepoints_zpse30e648a.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Home[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/awv9ABo.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Penguin[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jhQktRf.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Experiments!![/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/J1kO6VN.png[/img]
[size=15pt]Revenants!![/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AV4KuiN.png[/img]
[size=15pt]Vote Shop!![/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/swBH8MO.png[/img]
[size=15pt]Yaks[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vQ67VVx.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]Rocktail Fishing!![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tksa07M.png[/img]
Level shop [URL=http://s1193.photobucket.com/user/brandon-rsps/media/Untitled_zpsb485cfff.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1193.photobucket.com/albums/aa350/brandon-rsps/Untitled_zpsb485cfff.jpg[/img][/URL]
[center]Can we get it back to this?
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5XE8Q9T.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Divinity-Clique ll Custom Zombie minigame ll Experiments ll Rocktail Fishing
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

[center][size=18pt]This use to be Combat-x Untill i removed it, then put on the moparscape download page.
I’ve partnered up with someone now and we have changed the name to Divinity-Clique,
i’ve been working my ass off to improve loads on here from combat-x, such as drops, custom minigames to gain vesta, updating shops. Please don’t hate just enjoy![/size][/center]
